item.title: Leanne add a quote by Judy Blume
item.description: "The truth will make you odd." -- Judy Blume

item.title: Leanne add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "A photo says, you were happy, and I wanted to catch that. A photo says, you were so important to me that I put down everything else to come watch." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Leanne add a quote by Sarra Manning
item.description: "Just once, I'd like to find a boy. And I like him and he likes me. And we have a laugh and the kissing's really good and there's no-one getting in the way of the laughing and the kissing. Is that too much to ask?" -- Sarra Manning

item.title: Leanne add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "All endings are also beginnings. We just don't know it at the time." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Leanne add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "All parents damage their children. It cannot be helped. Youth, like pristine glass, absorbs the prints of its handlers. Some parents smudge, others crack, a few shatter childhoods completely into jagged little pieces, beyond repair." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Leanne add a quote by Anne Frank
item.description: "It's really a wonder that I haven't dropped all my ideals, because they seem so absurd and impossible to carry out. Yet I keep them, because in spite of everything, I still believe that people are really good at heart." -- Anne Frank
